about_the_game:
Immense yourself in the original soundtrack to relive the broad spectrum of various emotions experienced in South of the Circle. The OST by Ed Critchley vividly encapsulates the unique blend of cinema and a video game. The complete soundtrack includes a total of 22 tracks available in various formats (.MP3, .WAV, .FLAC). Along with the music, you’ll receive additional digital goods that can be used to customize your computer or smartphone.



Ed Critchley is a UK-based composer for Bafta award-winning State of Play Games, and remixes for bands such as Archive & Floex.

This package includes:

  • 22 tracks from the original game soundtrack (.MP3, .WAV, .FLAC)
  • 3 digital desktop wallpapers
  • 3 digital mobile wallpapers
